sub_title: Researcher at Wageningen Plant Research | Greenhouse Horticulture - Plant Nutrition Specialist
summary:
Passionate in nature and agricultural systems. Specialized in greenhouse horticulture. Expert in soilless systems, indoor cultivation, plant nutrition, fertirrigation and closed irrigation systems. 

Currently researcher in plant nutrition at Wageningen UR Greenhouse Horticulture.  Developing technology for the horticultural sector and furthering the knowledge of greenhouse crop nutrition.
